name: referral
description: ## notes ### how to use theme Althought official recommend use `As a Hugo Module`, but if you want deploy it to [Vercel](https://vercel.com/guides/deploying-hugo-with-vercel), [As-git-submodule](https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke#as-git-submodule) is recommended, details [Need to install Go to use Hugo modules](https://github.com/vercel/community/discussions/38)!
